profile.name: Alessandra Parziale
profile.title: Research Assistant
profile.specialty: Currently working on Fairness Engineering and Testing

paragraphs: I graduated cum laude in 2024 with a Master's degree in Computer Science from the University of Salerno, specializing in Software Engineering and IT Management. I am currently a research assistant at the Software Engineering Laboratory (SeSa), where I focus on studying and experimenting with techniques for analyzing and testing fairness in Machine Learning systems.

awards and recognition.title: Best Paper Award For Contextual Fairness-Aware Practices in ML: A Cost-Effective Empirical Evaluation

1st International Workshop on Fairness in Software Systems "

projects.title: Esistere
projects.description: Managed a team of university students to develop Esistere, a web application dedicated to creating technological solutions to improve the lives of Alzheimer's patients and their caregivers.
